official_title: A bill to require research into possible uses of solid wastes resulting from mining and processing coal.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of the Energy Research and Development Administration to make a full and complete investigation and study, including research, into possible uses of solid wastes resulting from mining and processing coal. States that such study shall include the possible use of such waste as fuel, and the possible acquisition of land on which such waste is located through the power of eminent domain and the subsequent use of such land for public purposes.

titles.title: A bill to require research into possible uses of solid wastes resulting from mining and processing coal.
